author: aaron
msg: Rename buildconf.sh as buildconf, and make it executable.

author: wrowe
msg: Never on 'official' apr-iconv release before, but apr-util for Win32

author: wrowe
msg: We no longer want or need /debugtype:both and we've discovered that
/pdbtype:sept is harmful (it assures that we don't get locals and other
type information in the final .pdb symbols database.)  However, /opt:ref
would be helpful for release builds since it optimized away unused

author: wrowe
msg: The install target copies *.so, *.pdb to the target.  Unfortunately,
that grabed *_src.pdb as well, which should not be in the distribution.
This patch creates a path/iconv/objs/ directory for all .obj and _src.pdb
files which can be discarded with no problems.
